homePageTitle: Lieb ist pool - the best way to pool
notInPool: You are not in pool. Choose a pool from the list
makeOneMeasurement: Contact you pool admin to make one
LowFat: Your fat percentage is extremely low. You should eat more healthy food.
NormalFat: Your fat percentage is great. Continue in the same spirit!
HighFat: Your fat percentage is high. You should do more cardio, balance your diet and drink more water.
LowMuscle: Your muscle percentage is low. You should do more strength exercises with no more than 8 reps per set and eat more protein-containing foods.
NormalMuscle: Your muscle percentage is great! Continue in the same spirit!
HighMuscle: You are a great fellow, your muscle percentage is really high! But you should visit a doctor and get an ultrasound of the heart, as the heart can be enlarged due to high loads
ExtremelyLowBMI: Your BMI is extremely low! Contact doctor and nutritionist as soon as possible!
LowBMI: Your BMI is a bit lower than recommended. You should eat more healthy food and balance your diet.
NormalBMI: Your BMI is great! Continue in the same spirit!
HighBMI: Your BMI is a bit higher than recommended. You should do more sports and balance your diet.
ExtremelyHighBMI: Your BMI is extremely high! Contact doctor and nutritionist as soon as possible!
NormalStress: Your level of stress is normal. Relax and enjoy you life.
HighStress: Your level of stress is really high! Contact a psychologist.
LowPressure: Your pressure is low. Don't drink a lot of coffee, do not stand for a long time and contact a doctor.
HighPressure: Your pressure is high. Don't drink a lot of alcohol, don't smoke cigarettes, and refrain from exercising until you consult a doctor.
